prompt: I have an audio and I need the transcript. Which app or AI tool can I use?

hidden_queries: apps or AI tools to transcribe audio to text
metadata.generated_search_query: apps or AI tools to transcribe audio to text

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are reliable apps and AI tools you can use to transcribe audio to text: Free / Easy to Start Otter.ai – Upload audio or record live, gets pretty accurate transcripts, searchable/editable. Otter.ai
AudioToText.com – Free online tool; no sign-up needed, supports common formats like MP3/WAV. audiototext.com
FreeScribe.app – Free AI transcription with speaker ID and export options. FreeScribe
Restream Transcription – Simple browser transcriber with good accuracy. Restream
SoundWise.ai – Free speech-to-text online converter. soundwise.ai
More Accurate / Feature-Rich Sonix – High-accuracy AI transcription, multi-language, summaries. Sonix
TurboScribe – Unlimited audio/video transcription in many languages. TurboScribe
Descript – Desktop tool with editing and transcription. Descript

sources.title: The Gemini app feature you actually wanted is here
sources.snippet:
Google's Gemini app has launched a highly anticipated feature that allows users to upload and process audio files across Android, iOS, and the web. The app now supports MP3, M4A, and WAV formats and automatically transcribes uploaded audio, extracts key points, highlights important quotes or action items, and generates clear summaries. This update caters especially to users looking to convert meetings, lectures, interviews, or voice notes into searchable, organized documents. According to Josh Woodward, VP of Google Labs and Gemini, this was the most requested user feature.

Users can access the feature via the plus menu on mobile or "Upload files" on the web. Audio upload limitations include a cap of 10 files at once with a total duration not exceeding 10 minutes for free users—double the five-minute video limit. Paid users receive higher caps. However, the 10-file per prompt rule still applies universally to all upload types. Despite these boundaries, the generous audio allowances and robust summarization capabilities make this a valuable addition to Gemini’s AI toolset.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Other Options Google Gemini (via app/web) – Upload audio for transcription plus summaries (limits on free use). Android Central

sources.title: Transcribe Audio to Text by Evernote - Fast, Accurate and Easy
sources.snippet: Convert audio to text instantly with our AI-powered transcription tool. Fast, accurate, and easy to use—perfect for meetings, interviews, and more.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Evernote AI Transcribe – If you use Evernote, it has built-in transcription. Evernote

sources.title: 9 Best AI Transcription Tools for 2025 (17 Reviewed)
sources.snippet: AI Transcription Tools are software applications that use artificial intelligence and machine learning to help you transcribe audio and video recordings into text.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Tips Start with free tools to test your audio quality and clarity. For interviews/meetings with multiple speakers, pick tools with speaker ID. usefulai.com
